project_descr: The Lebanon Environmental Pollution Abatement Project (LEPAP) aims at reducing industrial pollution in targeted industrial enterprises and to strengthen the monitoring and enforcement capabilities of the Ministry of Environment.

outputs.output_descr: The Lebanon Environmental Pollution Abatement Project (LEPAP) aims at reducing industrial pollution in targeted industrial enterprises and to strengthen the monitoring and enforcement capabilities of the Ministry of Environment.
